A vetítő vászon fő része matt fehér színű, fekete szélekkel. A konstrukció megjelenését a jól megválasztott fekete szín segíti. It is ideal for recording vocals, acoustic instruments and other sound sources where detailed and faithful reproduction is key. The Melo-S1 microphone uses a large 34mm gold-plated diaphragm and a cardioid polar pattern that minimizes sound pickup from the sides and rear and focuses on the sound source directly in front of the microphone. It delivers clear and detailed sound with a frequency response of 20-20,000 Hz. The microphone connects via a balanced 3-pin XLR connector and requires 24V or 48V phantom power. The package also includes a shock mount and a 3/8" to 5/8" adapter to facilitate mounting on various microphone stands.
